snippet: In this horror sequel, a woman takes refuge in a rural home with her twin sons, who are then manipulated by evil.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews movie Sinister 2, directed by Ciaran Foy.
lead_paragraph: In this horror sequel, a woman takes refuge in a rural home with her twin sons, who are then manipulated by evil.

headline.main: Review: In ‘Sinister 2,’ a Murderous Being Returns for More Mayhem
headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘Sinister 2,’ a Murderous Being Returns for More Mayhem
